DataElement.preferredName: Hospital Intensive Care Unit Discharge Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of releasing from a health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy._the date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the releasing from a health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.

Concepts.definition: An institution that provides medical, surgical, or psychiatric care and treatment for the sick or the injured.

Property.preferredDefinition: A health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy.:In healthcare, discharge represents the end point of an inpatient hospital contact which consists of one or several days of care. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: A health care facility unit that provides intensive care to critically ill patients and patients with complex medical problems who require constant monitoring or special therapy.
The release of a patient from a course of care.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.
